descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana][heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
High resolution - pure. Naked. FLAME. :D
For you if you thought it too odd that beings comprised of fire wear clothes, albeit cool, anatomically integrated, spectral looking ones :) 
plus it looks better, imo.
I\'ve included an Optional for better fire while letting them keep their clothes

[heading]UPDATE HISTORY[/heading]
Update 1.1 : Added new high res flame texture and an optional silver version

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data\\
